Blake's (Richmond) Onion Yellow Med 3 Outer Rings 4-5 LB PO# 047981 Lot#787806-6883R5, 795046-3948R1, 787806-6883R3, 795046-3948R2  Use  By Date: 04/03/2024 Pueblo Fruit and Vegetable CO.
